abstract: Yahoo said on Thursday that it would add the former chief executives of Viacom and Nextel Partners to its board as part of the company’s deal to avoid a proxy fight with the investor Carl C. Icahn.
snippet: Yahoo said on Thursday that it would add the former chief executives of Viacom and Nextel Partners to its board as part of the company’s deal to avoid a proxy fight with the investor Carl C. Icahn.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo said on Thursday that it would add the former chief executives of Viacom and Nextel Partners to its board as part of the company’s deal to avoid a proxy fight with the investor Carl C. Icahn.

headline.main: 2 Backed by Icahn to Join Yahoo Board
